name: Trade
instructions: MCP Server - Trade Model Context Protocol Server Implementation

get_all_algo_types.name: get_all_algo_types
get_all_algo_types.description: Get a list of all supported algorithmic trading strategy types.

get_algo_description.name: get_algo_description
get_algo_description.description: Get the description for a specific algorithmic trading strategy type.

get_all_brokers.name: get_all_brokers
get_all_brokers.description: Get a list of all supported brokers.

get_broker_description.name: get_broker_description
get_broker_description.description: Get the description for a specific broker.

get_all_traders.name: get_all_traders
get_all_traders.description: Get a list of all registered traders

get_trader_description.name: get_trader_description
get_trader_description.description: Get the description for a specific trader, including their name and desk code

get_all_desks.name: get_all_desks
get_all_desks.description: Get a list of all trading desks.

get_desk_description.name: get_desk_description
get_desk_description.description: Get the description for a specific trading desk.

get_all_trade_field_names.name: get_all_trade_field_names
get_all_trade_field_names.description: Get a list of all available trade field names.

get_all_sides.name: get_all_sides
get_all_sides.description: Get a list of all supported trade sides (e.g., Buy, Sell).

get_all_order_types.name: get_all_order_types
get_all_order_types.description: Get a list of all supported order types.

get_all_client_ids.name: get_all_client_ids
get_all_client_ids.description: Get a list of all client IDs.

get_all_trading_account_ids.name: get_all_trading_account_ids
get_all_trading_account_ids.description: Get a list of all trading account IDs, also known as staff id or trader id.

annotations.title: Get all trading account IDs, also known as staff id or trader id.

get_all_staff_types.name: get_all_staff_types
get_all_staff_types.description: Get a list of all staff types with their three character mnemonic codes (TDS, TRD, OPS, FIN, TEC, CPM).

get_staff_by_type.name: get_staff_by_type
get_staff_by_type.description: Get a list of all staff members for a specific staff type code = three character mnemonic (e.g., TRD for traders, TDS for sales traders).

get_staff_type_description.name: get_staff_type_description
get_staff_type_description.description: Get the description for a specific three character staff type code (e.g., TRD, TDS, OPS, FIN, TEC, CPM).

get_desks_staff_has_access_to.name: get_desks_staff_has_access_to
get_desks_staff_has_access_to.description: Get all trading desks that a specific staff member has access to view data for. Use this to determine which desk data a staff member is authorized to see based on their access permissions.

annotations.title: Get desks staff has access to

get_staff_who_have_access_to_desk.name: get_staff_who_have_access_to_desk
get_staff_who_have_access_to_desk.description: Get all staff members who have access to view data for a specific trading desk. Use this to find out which staff can see data from a particular desk.

annotations.title: Get staff who have access to desk

does_staff_id_have_desk_access.name: does_staff_id_have_desk_access
does_staff_id_have_desk_access.description: Check if a specific staff member has access to view data for a specific trading desk. Returns true/false to verify access permissions before showing sensitive desk data.

annotations.title: Check if staff has desk access

get_permissions.name: get_permissions
get_permissions.description: Get the permissions for a specific user role, showing what capabilities (trades, instruments, news, research, clients, messages, datamine) they have read/write access to. Use this to understand what a role can do in the system.

get_trades.name: get_trades
get_trades.description: Get a list of matching trades by passing a field name (can be nested using dots) and a case sensitive regex pattern. All trades with the field that matches the pattern are returned.

annotations.title: Get trades by field and regex
